title: Ovie Soko and India Reynolds split four months after Love Island final
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Ovie Soko and India Reynolds have split just four months after coming third in Love Island.

The pair hadn't been pictured together for weeks and both sides were rocked with cheating rumours - which they always denied.

MailOnline confirmed the pair split but there is no more information as to who ended the relationship or why.

The only remaining couples from this year's Love Island are Tommy Fury and Molly-Mae Haugue as well as Curtis Pritchard and Maura Higgins.

(Image: PA)

Ovie, 28, was forced to deny romancing Maya Jama and India also fought back against claims she snogged her ex, footballer Kieran Gibbs.

Ovie said: "You know what's a joke? I've never met Maya. I've never met her in my life. I swear to God, I've never met her in my life."

(Image: ITV)

The heartthrob, who won the affection of Love Island fans for his chilled attitude and humour, added: "They did filming for the very last [Love Island] Aftersun, which was at the villa, where she was there with two other talents and the whole cast we'd sort of shot - I think it was like a promo.

"You know, she was standing outside a door but, no, never met her in my life."
description: The pair hadn't been pictured together for weeks but only confirmed their split today
